org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Class MyCloudlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Cloudlet
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.MyCloudlet

  • public class MyCloudlet
extends Cloudlet
    My Cloudlet extends Cloudlet.java by adding RequiredFiles and DataFiles parameters. RequiredFiles is a list of fileNames that is required by the Cloudlet. Consequently, these files will be retrieve from the persistent storage of the datacenter. DataFiles is a list of Files that need to be added on the datacenter. Thus, these files will be added to the persistent storage.
    Author:
    Baptiste Louis

        The constructor.
        Parameters:
        cloudletId - id
        cloudletLength - length in Million Instruction(s)
        pesNumber - number of Processing Element(s)
        cloudletFileSize - size in MB
        cloudletOutputSize - output size in MB
        utilizationModelCpu - CPU model
        utilizationModelRam - RAM model
        utilizationModelBw - BW model
        requiredFiles - list of required filenames
        dataFiles - list of "to storage" files
